sentences.sContent: Harding gave him the news without preamble (= without saying anything else before it ) .
sentences.sCn: 哈丁开门见山把消息告诉了他。

phrases.pCn: 直截了当地，开门见山地，单刀直入地

remMethod.val: pre (前) + amble (跑) → 一本书中跑在最前面的话 → 前言

trans.tranOther: a statement at the beginning of a book, document, or talk, explaining what it is about
